measured_by: double-pass agreement analysis of response consistency across identical stimulus repetitions
justification: The Methods state that by examining response consistency across repeated presentations of the same stimuli, “it is possible to estimate the average level of internal noise.”

measured_by: frequency and latency (response time) of second button presses in the dynamic luminance discrimination task
justification: During the 1-s post-decision period participants could press again, and the study’s “main question of interest was whether the frequency and timing of changes of mind would vary.”

measured_by: percentage of correct initial responses in the luminance discrimination task
justification: Mixed-effects models were applied to “initial decision accuracy” defined as a binary correct / error outcome for the first button press.
